item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, October 15, 2024 at 2:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Web Browser Engineering (310 points | 46 comments)

3. Show HN: I built the most over-engineered Deal With It emoji generator (31 points | 6 comments)
4. Short films by Lillian F. Schwartz (1927-2024) (46 points | 8 comments)

6. World conker champion found with steel chestnut, cleared of cheating (319 points | 432 comments)
7. Drawing Graphics on Apple Vision with the Metal Rendering API (72 points | 41 comments)
8. 19th century lions preyed on humans and giraffes (20 points | 6 comments)

10. Gosub – An open-source browser engine (335 points | 149 comments)
11. MP3 to EXE (1999) (23 points | 8 comments)
12. Turn your Android phone into a modern ham radio transceiver (427 points | 149 comments)
13. Life expectancy rise slows down (14 points | 2 comments)

21. Show HN: Vortex – a high-performance columnar file format (208 points | 51 comments)
22. Cargo Airships Are Happening (120 points | 116 comments)

25. The Physics of Magic Windows (2021) (138 points | 7 comments)
26. Google commits to buying power generated by nuclear-energy startup Kairos Power (528 points | 411 comments)
27. Play 3.0 mini – A lightweight, reliable, cost-efficient Multilingual TTS model (215 points | 71 comments)
28. Routine dental X-rays are not backed by evidence (235 points | 235 comments)
29. Can a biologist fix a radio? What I learned while studying apoptosis (2002) [pdf] (67 points | 22 comments)
30. Furilabs Linux Phone (142 points | 179 comments)
